original_text: And I will let loose the wild beasts against you, which shall bereave you of your children and destroy your livestock and make you few in number, so that your roads shall be deserted.
korean_text: 내가 들짐승을 너희 중에 보내리니 그것들이 너희의 자녀를 움키고 너희 가축을 멸하며 너희의 수효를 줄이리니 너희의 길들이 황폐하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will let loose the wild beasts against you
which shall bereave you of your children
and make you few in number
so that your roads shall be deserted
